entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Claresholm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:34 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -26.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -30.0°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
